Catalan parliamentary corpus ParlaMint-ES-CT-en, 2018-05-12 0901.ana [ParlaMint-en.ana SAMPLE]

respStmt.resp: Data retrieval, first conversion to XML and to ParlaMint TEI
Machine translation to English and linguistic analysis of the translation

availability.p: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License

bibl.title: Parlament de Catalunya diaris de sessions de parlamentaries
Parliament of Catalonia daily sessions

projectDesc.p: ParlaMint is a project that aims to (1) create a multilingual set of comparable corpora of parliamentary proceedings uniformly encoded according to the ParlaMint encoding guidelines, covering the period from 2015 to mid-2022; (2) add linguistic annotations to the corpora and machine-translate them to English; (3) make the corpora available through concordancers; and (4) build use cases in Political Sciences and Digital Humanities based on the corpus data.

prefixDef.p: Private URIs with this prefix point to aligned source elements of the MTed corpus.

div.head: Sessió 9.1
div.note: The session is open at twelve in the middle and two minutes. He presides over the President of the Parliament, accompanied by all the members of the Bureau, who are assisted by the Secretaries-General and the President-in-Office.
ORDER OF THE DAY OF THE CONVENTION
Single point: Program debate and investiture vote of Member Quim Torra and Pla, candidate proposed to the Presidency of the Generality (tram. 201-00005/12).

u.note: Program debate and investiture vote of Member Quim Torra and Pla, candidate proposed to the Presidency of the Generality

As you know, the only point on the order of the day of this plenary session is the debate on the programme and the vote on the investiture of Mr Quim Torra and Mr Pla, a candidate proposed to the Presidency of the Government of Catalonia.

In accordance with Rule 149.1 of the Rules of Procedure of the Parliament of Catalonia, the investment debate begins with the reading of the resolution of the President of the Parliament in which the candidate for the Presidency of the Generality is proposed. I pray in this case to the secretary first that I give reading to this resolution.

Mr President... "Proposal for a candidate for the Presidency of the Generality, the Presidency of the Parliament, in accordance with Article 4 of Law 13/2008 of 5 November, of the Presidency of the Generality and of the Government. Having consulted again the representatives of the groups and parliamentary subgroups, proposed as the new candidate for the presidency of the Generality the deputy Quim Torra and Pla, and I leave without effect the proposal of candidate of the 9th of April 2018.
"The very Honourable Speaker of the Parliament of Catalonia, Roger Torrent and Ramío, Palau del Parlament, on May 11, 2018."

div.note: The session rises to a quarter-eight on the evening and two minutes.
